presentation.fsa
Class GraphModel

java.lang.Object
  model.Publisher
      presentation.fsa.GraphModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subscriber
public class GraphModel
extends Publisher
implements Subscriber

Mediates between the Automaton model and the visual representation. Observes and updates the Automaton. Updates the graphical visualization metadata and synchronizes it with the Automaton model. Is observed and updated by the GraphDrawingView.

Author:
helen bretzke

addLabelToEdge

public void addLabelToEdge(java.lang.String text,
                           Edge edge)
The following steps should be done by the text tool in the context of labelling an edge. If text corresponds to an event in the local alphabet find the event. If text corresponds to an event in the global alphabet find the event, add it to the local alphabet. Otherwise, create a new event and add it to both alphabets. For nows: Open the EdgeLabellingDialog and then Creates a new transition, assigns the event with symbol corresponding to text to the transition and adds the transition to the given edge.

Parameters:
text - an event symbol

getElementIntersectedBy

protected GraphElement getElementIntersectedBy(java.awt.geom.Point2D p)

Returns:
the graph element intersected by the given point or null if nothing hit.
